commitResults.messageTitle: Add greeting and rename chatbot from Duke to Aeolian

commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot first greets the user, then asks the user for input command.
It will echo out the user's input command until the user keys in the
command "bye".

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor output messages to use constant strings
commitResults.messageBody:
Output messages are now built from GREETING_MESSAGE,
HORIZONTAL_LINE and GOODBYE_MESSAGE constant strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to store inputs and display them
commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot will save all user inputs and display them in a numbered
list using the "list" command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to mark or unmark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks can now be marked and unmarked using the following syntax:
- "mark <int>" where <int> is the number in checklist to mark
- "unmark <int>" where <int> is the number in checklist to unmark

For example, "mark 2" will mark the second task in the list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Todo, Deadline, Event classes and implement toString in Task
Add support for Todo, Deadline and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
Todo, Deadline and Event are inherited from Task.
- Todo are tasks without any date/time attached to it
- Deadline are tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time
- Event are tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at are
specific date/time

The command syntaxes are:
- "todo <description>"
- "deadline <description> /by <date>"
- "event <description> /from <date> /to <date>"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add and pass automated text UI testing
Fix blank line to be more consistent in text UI
Add AerolianException and error handling for Todo and invalid commands
